DOC.brief_summary: Once patients' postoperative pain intensity reaches a moderate-to-severe level, they are randomized to receive intranasal ketamine or placebo. Patients remain in the study unit for 3 hours post administration and assess pain intensity and pain relief throughout the 3 hour postoperative period.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Intranasal Ketamine for the Treatment of Postoperative Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Healthy patients at least 16 years of age requiring two or more third molar extractions Less than 16 years old Other exclusion criteria may apply
